mints.atLeast2Mints: You need at least 2 mints to perform an inter-mint swap.
mints.backupNotCreated: Backup token could not be created.
mints.checkProofsQ: Are you sure that you want to check all the proofs?
mints.checkProofsTxt: This will check if your token are spendable and will otherwise delete them.
mints.delMintHint: Deleting a mint with balance can result in an unexpected total balance. You will keep the token associated with the mint, but you will not be able to redeem them until you re-add the mint.
mints.delMintSure: Are you sure that you want to remove this mint?
mints.errDelProofs: Something went wrong while deleting proofs.
mints.lowBackupBal: The mint has no balance for a backup!
mints.mintNoContact: The mint has no contact info
mints.noAdditional: This mint has no additional info
mints.noProofs: Found no proofs for this mint.
mints.swapFail: Could not perform an inter-mint swap
mints.swapNotAllowed: Swap out from a test mint is not possible.
mints.swapRisk: Swap token from one mint for token from another mint. For a brief moment, you will be trusting two mints at the same time. There is things that can go wrong. Use at own risk.
mints.testMintHint: This is a test mint to play around with. Add it anyway?
mints.trustMintSure: Are you sure that you want to trust this mint?
mints.invoiceAmountHint: Select the amount of Ecash you would like to receive. The mint will then create an invoice which you will have to pay using a Lightning wallet.
mints.cashOutAmountHint: Select the amount. Note that Lightning fees can occur. The overpaid fees will be refunded to you.
mints.ecashAmountHint: Select the amount of Ecash you would like to send.
mints.chooseMintHint: Choose a mint from which you would like to receive Ecash. The mint becomes custodian of your funds.
mints.chooseMeltMintHint: Choose a mint from which you would like to cash out your funds.
mints.sendEcashHint: Choose a mint from which you would like to create a Cashu token.
mints.chooseTarget: Choose the receiver of the payment.
mints.invoiceHint: This can take a few seconds...
mints.meltAddressbookHint: Choose your own LNURL or any other contact as a payment receiver.
mints.meltInputHint: Create a Lightning invoice or paste a LNURL into an input field.
mints.invoiceInputHint: Note that Lightning fees can occur. The overpaid fees will be refunded to you.
mints.meltScanQRHint: Create a Lightning invoice with another device and simply scan it.
mints.meltSwapHint: Pick another mint from your trusted list as the payment receiver.
mints.coinSelectionHint: Your Ecash balance is essentially a collection of coin-sets. Coin selection allows you to choose the set of coins you want to spend. Coin-sets are assigned a keyset-ID by the mint, which may change over time. Newly added keysets are highlighted in green. It is advisable to spend older sets first.
mints.processingPaymentByMint: The mint is processing the payment according to your request

wallet.disclaimer: Please note that this is an alpha version in its early stage and is still undergoing testing before its official release. The software and all content found on it are provided on an “as is” and “as available” basis. We do not give any warranties, whether express or implied, as to the suitability or usability of the software or any of its content. Cashu is still experimental and not production-ready.
